version_description:
• New quotes and new authors added
• Lots of lovely love quotes added so you can share the love

• Now available on all iOS devices, including Apple Watch
• Hyperloop of quotes on Apple Watch gives you never-ending, quote-loving moments of fun
• New bookmarking feature lets you pick up right where you left off
• New Elon Musk quotes added (making our app 10x better!)

• Wow - dazzling quotes with photos now on Apple Watch

• For this update only: Apple Watch users - To avoid install issues on Apple Watch, delete the old BrainyQuote Watch App by tapping on the X after a long press on the BrainyQuote Watch App icon.

Existing users - If you no longer receive the quote of the day, open the app to restart notifications.

• Fixed the issue of the quote of the day notification disappearing after notifications were scheduled
• Added side by side app functionality for new iPads
• Added great new quotes and authors
• Minor bug fixes

• Added new Copy Quote action, making it easy to copy and paste quote text
• Added 25 beautiful new quote images
• Added great new quotes and authors
• Updated for iOS 10
• Minor bug fixes

• Added great new quotes
• Several improvements and bug fixes related to enabling or disabling Quote of the Day notifications

Saving and sharing your custom quote photos are now even easier with a one-tap save to camera roll button. Directly share quotes to your favorite apps, or save a custom quote photo and gain more control over your sharing.

If you love our app, please tap the pinwheel and pay it forward by offering a one-time quick tip to support our mission of bringing the joy of quotations to the world.

• Updates for iOS 13
• Includes a new modular watch face complication with hourly quote updates
• Added great new quotes and authors
